about.title: About
about.projectBody: OMNILOG is like Stremio for your logs: an aggregator of APIs so you can have everything in one place. Instead of eight separate apps, use one to track movies, TV shows, board games, video games, books, anime, manga, and comics in one place. Search by category, add custom entries when something isn't in the database, and keep your reviews and grades together. No need to jump between different apps or spreadsheets—everything you watch, play, and read lives here.
